term_trace.Requirement: The AUV system is developed as a Module named "AUV_Module".

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" shall define a Function named "odist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").
term_trace.Concept_description: A defined operation within the AUV_Module that performs a specific task or calculation.
term_trace.Instance_description: A function that calculates and returns the distance from the AUV to a given obstacle.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" shall define a Function named "hdist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the horizontal distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").

term_trace.Instance_description: A function that calculates and returns the horizontal distance from the AUV to a given obstacle.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" shall define a Function named "vdist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the vertical distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").
